languages.text: "Да будет так. Перед тем, как мы начнем... Я очень горд наблюдать, в кого вы превратились, {name}. Вам удалось превзойти Теодору, и я рад, что вершить судьбу мне придется не одному, а с надежн{mf|ым|ой} союзни{mf|ком|цей}".

"So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am encouraged by your pragmatism, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora and my expectations, and I am grateful to know that I will not determine the fate of Humanity alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."
languages.original_text: "Да будет так. Перед тем, как мы начнем... Я очень горд наблюдать, в кого вы превратились, {name}. Вам удалось превзойти Теодору, и я рад, что вершить судьбу мне придется не одному, а с надежн{mf|ым|ой} союзни{mf|ком|цей}".

traits.locale_text: "So be it. Before we begin... I am very proud to see how well you turned out, {name}. You managed to surpass Theodora and I am happy to know that I will not determine the fate of the world alone, but with a trusty ally at my side."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So be it. Before we begin... I am very proud to see how well you turned out, {name}. You managed to surpass Theodora and I am happy to know that I will not determine the fate of the world alone, but with a trusty ally at my side."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So be it. Before we begin... I'm very proud to see how well you have turned out, {name}. You have managed to surpass Theodora and I'm happy to know that I won't determine the fate of the world alone, but with a trusty ally at my side."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So be it. Before we begin... I'm very proud to see how well you have turned out, {name}. You have managed to surpass Theodora and I'm happy to know that I won't determine the fate of the world alone, but with a trusty ally at my side."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am proud to see how far you have come, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora, and it heartens me to know that I won't have to determine the fate of the world alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am encouraged by your pragmatism, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora and my expectations, and I am grateful to know that I will not determine the fate of Humanity alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Très bien. Avant que nous ne commencions, je tiens à vous dire... que je trouve votre pragmatisme encourageant, {name}. Vous avez surpassé Théodora ainsi que mes attentes, et je me réjouis d'avoir {mf|un allié|une alliée} fidèle à mes côtés pour déterminer l'avenir du monde, plutôt que de devoir le faire seul. »
languages.original_text: "So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am encouraged by your pragmatism, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora and my expectations, and I am grateful to know that I will not determine the fate of Humanity alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. Avant que nous ne commencions... sachez que je suis très fier de votre évolution, {name}. Vous avez surpassé Théodora et je me réjouis d'avoir {mf|un allié|une alliée} fidèle à mes côtés pour déterminer l'avenir du monde, plutôt que de devoir le faire seul. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Que así sea. Antes de empezar, quiero decirle que... su pragmatismo me inspira, {name}. Ha superado a Theodora y todas mis expectativas, y me alivia mucho saber que no determinaré el destino de la Humanidad en solitario, sino con un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a} de confianza a mi lado».
languages.original_text: "So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am encouraged by your pragmatism, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora and my expectations, and I am grateful to know that I will not determine the fate of Humanity alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."

traits.locale_text: «Que así sea. Antes de empezar... estoy muy orgulloso de lo lejos que ha llegado, {name}. Ha conseguido superar a Theodora y me alegra saber que no determinaré el destino del mundo en solitario, sino con un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a} de confianza».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “那就这样吧。在我们开始之前，我想说……你的实用主义思想让我振奋不已，{name}。你已经超越了西奥多拉，也超越了我的期望。我很高兴，因为我不再需要独自决定这个世界的命运，我已经找到了值得信赖的盟友。”
languages.original_text: "So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am encouraged by your pragmatism, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora and my expectations, and I am grateful to know that I will not determine the fate of Humanity alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."

traits.locale_text: “那就这样吧。在我们开始之前……你能踏上这样的道路，我真的为你感到骄傲，{name}，因为你已经超越了西奥多拉。而且我很高兴，因为我不再需要独自决定这个世界的命运，我已经找到了值得信赖的盟友。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "So sei es. Bevor wir beginnen, sage ich dies ... Euer Pragmatismus schenkt mir Hoffnung, {name}. Ihr habt Theodora und meine Erwartungen übertroffen, und ich bin dankbar, zu wissen, dass ich nicht allein über das Schicksal der Menschheit entscheiden werde, sondern mit {mf|einem|einer} verlässlichen Verbündeten an meiner Seite."
languages.original_text: "So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am encouraged by your pragmatism, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora and my expectations, and I am grateful to know that I will not determine the fate of Humanity alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."

traits.locale_text: "So sei es. Bevor wir beginnen ... Es erfüllt mich zu Stolz, wie gut Ihr Euch entwickelt habt, {name}. Ihr habt Theodora übertroffen, und es freut mich, dass ich nicht alleine über das Schicksal der Welt entscheiden muss, sondern mit {mf|einem Verbündeten, dem|einer Verbündeten, der} ich vertraue, an meiner Seite.
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「それでいい。始める前に、一つ言っておこう…あなたの実利主義には感銘を受けているのだ、{name}。あなたはシオドーラと私の期待を超えている。人類の運命を私一人が決めるのではなく、信頼できる味方と共に進むことができると知って、嬉しく思っているのだよ」
languages.original_text: "So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am encouraged by your pragmatism, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora and my expectations, and I am grateful to know that I will not determine the fate of Humanity alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."

traits.locale_text: 「それでいい。始める前に、一つ言っておこう…あなたの実利主義には感銘を受けているのだ、{name}。あなたはシオドーラと私の期待を超えている。人類の運命を私一人が決めるのではなく、信頼できる味方と共に進むことができると知って、嬉しく思っているのだよ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Öyle olsun. Başlamadan önce söylemek istediğim bir şey var... Pragmatik bakışın bana cesaret veriyor {name}. Theodora'yı ve beklentilerimi aştın. İnsanlığın kaderini tek başıma değil, güvenilir bir müttefikle belirleyeceğimi bilmek içimi rahatlattı."
languages.original_text: "So be it. Before we begin, I will say this... I am encouraged by your pragmatism, {name}. You have surpassed Theodora and my expectations, and I am grateful to know that I will not determine the fate of Humanity alone, but with a dependable ally at my side."
